content.query:
select 
json_value(doc, '$.payment_type') as int 
JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.payment_type_desc') as varchar(20)
from OPENROWSET (
    bulk 'https://ammardls.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/payment_type.json',
    format = 'csv',
    fieldterminator ='0x0b',
    fieldquote = '0x0b'
   
    
    ) 
    with (doc varchar(max)) 
    as f


    -- List payment types [ single lines JSON ]
SELECT CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
       CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDoc, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15)) payment_type_desc
  FROM OPENROWSET(
      BULK 'payment_type.json',
      DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
      FORMAT = 'CSV',
      PARSER_VERSION = '1.0', 
      FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
      FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
      ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
  )
  WITH
  (
      jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)   -- All the data from JSON document into one record
  ) AS payments;
GO
